ai-tha-ap521:0.3_0: Once again the Elder Golden Fruit
ai-tha-ap521:1.1_0: “Only by name or by the running back,
ai-tha-ap521:2.4_0: I’ll stay in the same room.
ai-tha-ap521:3.4_0: from my hermitage I would come.
ai-tha-ap521:4.1_0: I’ll dwell as far as the forest.”
ai-tha-ap521:4.3_0: by the power of the Buddha,
ai-tha-ap521:5.1_0: and after seeing (him), the Lord of the World gained faith in Pāṭaliputta.
ai-tha-ap521:5.3_0: Having a bowl caught in a bowl,
ai-tha-ap521:6.1_0: Having gone to the Awakened One
ai-tha-ap521:6.3_0: The Buddha, out of compassion for me,
ai-tha-ap521:6.4_0: this is the word of the words.
ai-tha-ap521:7.2_0: Now you must return to me!”
ai-tha-ap521:7.4_0: then you will be your merit.’
ai-tha-ap521:8.2_0: at the end of the Community of monks
ai-tha-ap521:8.3_0: filling my mind with confidence in him,
ai-tha-ap521:9.2_0: with dance and song and music,
ai-tha-ap521:11.1_0: as far as the four islands
ai-tha-ap521:11.2_0: together with the oceans and mountains—
ai-tha-ap521:11.3_0: give him fruit to the Buddha,
ai-tha-ap521:12.3_0: They even defecated me in the wood,
ai-tha-ap521:13.1_0: I’ll dwell as far as the forest.”
ai-tha-ap521:13.3_0: And the kumbhaṇḍhas, Cāḷha, and Koḷivisa,
ai-tha-ap521:14.1_0: as a ruler of the strings.
ai-tha-ap521:14.3_0: They even defecated me in the wood,
ai-tha-ap521:15.2_0: all of them increased in greatness,
ai-tha-ap521:15.3_0: They go for refuge to me,
ai-tha-ap521:16.3_0: They even defecated me in the wood,
ai-tha-ap521:17.3_0: They even defecated me in the wood,
ai-tha-ap521:18.2_0: and those who stay in the open space—
ai-tha-ap521:18.3_0: All my teaching go for refuge
ai-tha-ap521:19.1_0: So hard to see, so subtle,
ai-tha-ap521:21.3_0: I am the one who breaks apart,
ai-tha-ap521:22.1_0: after going to the charnel ground, worshipping with his deep knowledge,
ai-tha-ap521:22.2_0: you’ve been accused like a tortoise:
ai-tha-ap521:23.1_0: There are three knowledges, and masters of psychic power,
ai-tha-ap521:23.2_0: the Buddha’s son, and his grandsons,
ai-tha-ap521:23.4_0: after informing them I had one of them,
ai-tha-ap521:24.3_0: I’m not aware of any living being
ai-tha-ap521:26.1_0: It was so welcome for me
ai-tha-ap521:28.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Sabbath.
ai-tha-ap521:29.1_0: for the sake of all fruits and for the Elders.
